sql-select.name: hist.GetInstanceSummaryProcessesToday
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT t.[EventTime] AS [EventTime] ,t.[NumberOfSystemProcesses] AS [System] ,t.[NumberOfUserProcesses] AS [User] ,t.[NumberOfActiveUserProcesses] AS [UserActive] ,t.[NumberOfBlockedProcesses] AS [Blocked] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceSummaryProcesses] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE CASE WHEN ((@EventDayMin IS NOT NULL) AND (@EventDayMax IS NOT NULL)) THEN t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) WHEN (@strDateTimeModifier IS NOT NULL) THEN t.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(t.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceSummaryProcesses] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) ELSE t.[EventDay] = date('1900-01-01') END ORDER BY t.[EventTime] ASC ;
